Caption: Prof. D. Venkateswarlu, HOD Chemical Engineering, reads out the names of graduands of Dept. of Chemical Engineering. Prof. B. Sengupto gives away the degrees.
Description: On the dais in the middle: Mr. M.C. Chagla. To his left: Dr. A.L. Mudaliar, Dr. Rajah Sir Muthiah Chettiar, Mr. Akbar Alikhan (member, Board of Governors), Dr. Y. Nayudamma, Mr. A.A. Rahim (member, Board of Governors), Prof. E.G. Ramachandran, Prof. R.G. Narayanamurthi, Prof. Klein, Prof. P.C. Varghese and Prof. Lutz.
